name: War Checkers
description:
A different take on the classic board game of checkers/ draughts. Play the game within a 3d environment where players are granted abilities to change the way this game is played. Help or hinder you chance of winning. Would you take the risk?  

This game was made within a couple of weeks for a University group project. The development team consisted of 4 artists and 2 coders. The names of which can be found below:

  1. Daniel Rhodes - Artist
  2. Max Southerton - Artist
  3. Patryk Rozwora - Artist
  4. Joe Forrester - Artist
  5. Joe Garlik - Coder
  6. David Harrison - Coder
